column1: The Captains of the West were nobles of Gondor and other allied forces that participated to the latter stages of the War of the Ring
column2: namely leading the Army of the West.

column4: Imrahil and other lords perhaps including Elladan and Elrohir
column5: p. 62 and they led the allied Army against the Morannon of Mordor and the ensuing Battle of the Morannon.
